overview: MediTect is an easy-to-use website helping users find nearby hospitals and manage their health accounts effortlessly.
tech: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, CodeIgniter, PHP, MySQL
process: Designed and developed over a period of 3 months using agile methodologies.
results: Featured on school's website, received positive feedback from users.

overview: A website showcasing company information, product catalogs, and a collection of articles related to the company's offerings.
